Workflow_WorkflowDefinition.description: Workflow to create a virtualization client
Workflow_WorkflowDefinition.inputs: <inputs><CompanyName class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><SDDCName class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><SDDCUserName class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><NoOfNodes class="java.lang.Integer" _list_="false" /><ovaPath class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><ProxyClient class="commvault.msgs.CvEntities.ClientEntity" _list_="false"><clientName /><clientId /><displayName /></ProxyClient><vmHost class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><vmNetwork class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><dataStore class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><resourcePool class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><dataCenterName class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><ExecutedFromAPI class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">false</ExecutedFromAPI><SDDCPassword class="workflow.types.EncryptedString" _list_="false" /><contentLibraryName class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><gatewayClientGroup class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /></inputs>
Workflow_WorkflowDefinition.name: CreateVirtualizationClient
Workflow_WorkflowDefinition.variables: <variables><clients class="java.lang.String" _list_="true" /><Password class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><AuthCode class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><hypervisorId class="java.lang.Integer" _list_="false" /><OrganizationId class="java.lang.Integer" _list_="false" /><NodeRange class="java.lang.Integer" _list_="true" /><NodeList class="java.lang.String" _list_="true" /><simPackageId class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><VMname class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><SDDCPassword class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /></variables>

Activity.description: activity to execute code snippets in the selected language
Activity.name: Script

inputs.val:
<inputs><script language="1" script="import java.util.*;
import java.io.*;

String temp = "";
try
{
a = xpath:{/workflow/CommServDBQuery_2/resultSets/row}.toArray();
if (xpath:{/workflow/inputs/ProxyClient/clientName}!= null && xpath:{/workflow/inputs/ProxyClient/clientName} != "")
{
 a1 = xpath:{/workflow/inputs/ProxyClient/clientId};
 a= new int[1];
 a[0] = a1;
}
int len = a.length;



for(int i =0; i< len ; i++)
{

 temp = temp + "\n" + "<associatedClients clientId=\"" + a[i] + "\" />";
}
}

catch(NullPointerException e)
{
logger.info("Caught NullPointerException");

}

return temp;

" /></inputs>

Activity.description: performs http operations
Activity.name: HttpClient

Activity.description: retrieves a list of values from xml
Activity.name: XPathQuery

inputs.val:
<inputs><inputXml class="java.lang.String" _list_="false"><App_CreatePseudoClientRequest>
   <clientInfo clientType="12">
      <virtualServerClientProperties>
         <virtualServerInstanceInfo vsInstanceType="1">
            <vmwareVendor vcenterHostName="xpath:{/workflow/inputs/SDDCName}">
               <virtualCenter userName="xpath:{/workflow/inputs/SDDCUserName}" password="xpath:{/workflow/variables/SDDCPassword}" />
            </vmwareVendor>
            <associatedClients>
               <memberServers>
                  <client clientGroupId="xpath:{/workflow/XPathQuery_2/result}"/>
               </memberServers>
            </associatedClients>
         </virtualServerInstanceInfo>
      </virtualServerClientProperties>
   </clientInfo>
   <entity clientName="xpath:{/workflow/inputs/CompanyName}_xpath:{/workflow/inputs/SDDCName}" />
</App_CreatePseudoClientRequest></inputXml><escapeXml class="java.lang.Boolean" _list_="false">false</escapeXml><commandArgs class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><sessionOptions class="workflow.types.cmd.SessionOptions" _list_="false"><useImpersonatedAccount class="java.lang.Boolean" _list_="false">true</useImpersonatedAccount><tokenFile class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><token class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /></sessionOptions></inputs>

Activity.description: retrieves a list of values from xml
Activity.name: XPathQuery

Activity.description: impersonates the user who created the workflow
Activity.name: ImpersonateCreator

Activity.description: executes queries against a commcell database
Activity.name: CommServDBQuery

inputs.val: <inputs><commCell /><query>select instance from app_application where clientId = (select id from app_client where name = 'xpath:{/workflow/XPathQuery_3/result}')</query></inputs>

<inputs><inputXml class="java.lang.String" _list_="false"><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><App_UpdateInstancePropertiesRequest>
    <instanceProperties>
        <virtualServerInstance>
            <associatedClients>
                xpath:{/workflow/Script_2/output}
            </associatedClients>
        </virtualServerInstance>
    </instanceProperties>
    <association>
        <entity instanceId = "xpath:{/workflow/CommServDBQuery_1/resultSets/row/col}"/>
    </association>
</App_UpdateInstancePropertiesRequest>
</inputXml><escapeXml class="java.lang.Boolean" _list_="false">false</escapeXml><commandArgs class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><sessionOptions class="workflow.types.cmd.SessionOptions" _list_="false"><useImpersonatedAccount class="java.lang.Boolean" _list_="false">true</useImpersonatedAccount><tokenFile class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /><token class="java.lang.String" _list_="false" /></sessionOptions></inputs>

Activity.name: CommServDBQuery

inputs.val:
<inputs><commCell /><query>select distinct clientId from simInstalledPackages si
left outer join
APP_ClientProp ac
on
si.ClientId = ac.componentNameId and ac.attrName = 'Installation Company ID'
where simPackageId xpath:{/workflow/variables/simPackageId} and ac.componentNameId IS NULL </query></inputs>

inputs.val:
<inputs><script language="1" script="import java.util.*;
import java.io.*;

String temp = "";
try
{
a = xpath:{/workflow/variables/NodeList}.toArray();
int len = a.length;



for(int i =0; i< len ; i++)
{

 temp = temp + "\n" + "<memberServers><client clientName=\""+a[i]+"\"/></memberServers>";
}
}

catch(NullPointerException e)
{
logger.info("Caught NullPointerException");

}

return temp;

" /></inputs>
